name: Suprise The Kid !
description:
Hello everyone.

This is my submission to the Yogcast game jam 2020 around the theme of suprise!

this game was made under 48 hours, and is a platformer where the goal is to collect all the ballons in the level in order to make a kid happy, all the while avoiding death.

but there is a twist ! after the tutorial level, a screen will popup asking you to press space and will give you a random handicap/benefit ! with a totale of 8 random events you can experience the game in 8 unique ways !

Remeber that this is a prototype and in no way a full game ! i'm open to all suggestions as long as they're constructive.

sincerly, Kingoat.
